programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: Buddy’s got a new trick up his paw – football. When Buddy’s owner suddenly becomes his school’s next quarterback, Buddy falls in with the huddle as well! The dynamite pairing of Buddy and Josh help carry the Timberwolves to the state championship. All is well until two wicked Russian circus owners show up to dognap Buddy to be their star attraction. A movie that is a touchdown for the entire family!

programme.title: A Random Encounter
programme.desc: A dual perspective, he-said, she-said, romantic comedy about two twenty-somethings (Laura and Kevin) trying to make it in Hollywood and their chance encounter at a local coffee shop that takes you on an entertaining journey of misunderstandings, bad timing, and almost missed chances. Starring Meghan Markle (TV's Suites) as Laura's superficial single roommate, Mindy, the couple must fight for their relationship to survive the craziness that is show business. A Random Encounter is a roller-coaster ride that proves finding your Prince Charming can be a right royal pain.

programme.title: All Things Valentine
programme.desc: A blogger who has had terrible luck on Valentine's Day meets a handsome veterinarian. Then she finds out he is the one who has been leaving rude comments on her Valentine’s Day articles and she questions if her luck has changed at all.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: The Romantics
programme.desc: Love is tested over one raucous night when seven college pals reunite to watch two of their own say ‘I do’. Based on the acclaimed novel by Galt Niederhoffer. Featuring an all star cast including Josh Duhamel, Malin Akerman, Adam Brody, Dianna Agron and Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: With his marriage and career against the ropes, dejected author Jack Spencer travels with his wife, Amanda, to an isolated glamping retreat in search of a spark. When a surprise double booking finds their private retreat anything but private, Jack spins into a comedic exploration of love, lost dreams, small-town-wisdom, and friendship with a miniature donkey to get over himself before he loses all he holds dear.

programme.desc: The Vagabonde family go freediving with Australian freedive champion Adam Stern.

programme.title: Food Busker - Quick and Easy Recipes
programme.desc: John Quilter is back in this quick and easy recipe special, cooking up some tasty beef satay, chicken nuggets, with a crunchy coating twist, a spicy chilli burrito, and a 'Juicy Lucy' cheeseburger.

programme.title: Food Busker - Soups and Bread
programme.desc: John Quilter returns with some delicious soup and bread recipes to warm the soul! The busker makes a classic, homemade chicken soup, a quick and easy Miso soup, the perfect Japanese inspired Hakata Soup for Ramen, and a mouth-watering Focaccia recipe thats a must for any hearty soups!

programme.title: Food Busker- Japanese Cuisine
programme.desc: Mr John Quilter cooks up three delicious Japanese dishes.

programme.title: Supercar Blondie - Most Expensive Cars
programme.desc: We join Alex as she checks out the world's most expensive cars, from a rare 1955 Mercedes to a brand new Bugatti to some classic Ferraris.

programme.title: Supercar Blondie - The World's Fastest Cars
programme.desc: We join Supercar Blondie as she gets her hands on some of the worlds fastest cars! Alex gets behind the wheel of the Koenigsegg Agera RS, the SSC Tuatara, and finishes off with a very special, exclusive look at the Devil Sixteen: yet to come on the market, with an expected 5000HP V16 Quad-Turbo!

programme.title: Supercar Blondie - The Future of Audi
programme.desc: Alex is back and gets her hands on some exclusive, futuristic Audi cars. Alex and Sergi experience the fully-automated Audi Skysphere, the 'AI-RACE, with an automated adjusting seat, sterering wheel, and pedals, and the Audi RS7 Sportback with a super topspeed of 300 KM/H!

programme.title: Savage Garage - Savage Motors
programme.desc: Randy and the savage team are back in a Savage Motors special! We join Randy as himself and Rachel both buy pimped-out Mercedes for completely different reasons! Later, Randy and Scott have a Tesla Model S Plaid speed-race to determine who is the superior driver.

programme.title: Savage Garage - Crown Rally Carnage Part 1
programme.desc: Join the Savage Rally crew in the first part of Crown Rally West 2021! From Lambo breakdowns and police-pullovers, what happens at Crown Rally West, stays at Crown Rally West!

programme.title: Savage Garage - Crown Rally Carnage Part 2
programme.desc: We rejoin the Savage Rally crew in the second part of their Crown Rally West 2021 adventure! Jimbo remeniscing about his mischevious past as he runs into an old friend and has yet another close-encounter with the local authorities as they make their way to the incredible Bonneville Salt Flats, a driving experience like no-other.

programme.title: TGE TV - Electric Cars
programme.desc: We join Tom in an all-electric car special, getting his hands on the brand new, all-electric, Audi E-Tron, and testing out one of the most unique electric cars soon to come to the market: The Citroen Ami.

programme.title: TGE TV - Porsche 911s
programme.desc: Today's episode of TGE is all about Porsche's as Tom gets his hands on some of the best '911s on the market!

programme.title: Supercars of London - Lambo Life
programme.desc: We join SOL Paul in this very special Lambo episode! Paul test not only his driving skills, but also his footy skills as he tries out a few moves with a famous football freestyler, and later Paul gives the inside scoop as to what it's like to own a lambo.

programme.title: Supercar Blondie - Monster Motors
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie is back and has got her hands on some serious beastly motors!

programme.title: Supercar Blondie - New Cars
programme.desc: Supercar blondie is back with a brand new episode all to do with the latest and greatest cars out there on the market, getting her hands on the new fully-electric Audi RS E-Tron GT, the tech-suave Ferrari Roma, and 3 very rare Hermes hypercars!

programme.title: Savage Garage - McLaren P1
programme.desc: Randy and the Savage team are back with an exciting episode all about McLaren.

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: Tim & Gendle have suckered in a crack stunt team and the crew from “storm parkour” to show us their skills and help turn an abandoned building into the location for a massive zombie chase.

programme.title: The Indestructibles
programme.desc: In this episode, we take the concept of multi-terrain board sports and push them to their limits. How big can you go on a set of retro grass skies? What’s the most insane thing you can do on a dry slope?

programme.title: Extraordinary Humans
programme.desc: Thom tracks down a man who has a right arm bigger than his left and sets another man the ultimate challenge to extinguish are using the water in his stomach.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: A murderer tries to kill his final victim as the car they are in slowly sinks to the bottom of a lake. The only way to save the victim is to rescue her as the car continues to sink. We test fire multiple handguns underwater to see if you can actually penetrate a car windshield and save the victim.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: In this iconic scene, Chief Brody hangs on to his sinking boat as a giant shark approaches him with a scuba tank lodged in its mouth. We construct a giant shark on a motorized platform to test if you can hit, and explode, the tank with an M1 Garand rifle while perched in a precarious position.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Here are amazing projects – based on science – that you can build yourself, all with things you can buy at a hardware store. Host Steve Spangler shows how to create your own t-shirt launcher. Plus, discover the substance that makes jelly slide.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Fill a glass with water and make the water disappear! How to do it? Well, the secret is inside a product that’s on the shelves of your supermarket. Host Steve Spangler roams the supermarket for things you can use to create your own science magic.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Host Steve Spangler shows how every day can be a spooky day with scary tricks and magic effects all based on science. Stage your own zombie party, complete with eerie, smoking beverages supernatural bubbles and fake blood.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler reveals the secrets to science tricks and stunts that will amaze your friends. They’re all some of his favorite experiments – like explosive bubbles you can hold in your hand and freezing water with your mind!

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Host Steve Spangler relaxes in his backyard with science tricks and inventions you can create outdoors. He exposes the secret to opening a car door with the power of your brain. And he reveals how to balance a ball on a spray of water.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler hosts the DIY SCI Contest for the most exciting demonstration of “Newton’s Third Law” – for every action there’s an equal and opposite reaction. The winner performs a supersized version of the experiment with Steve.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: We head to a winter wonderland in Banff, Alberta, Canada. Philippe joins the avalanche safety team at Ski Lake Louise as they show a few different ways of avalanche control including dynamite blasts on the mountain.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: Starting off in Hawaii, Philippe paddles out on a 6-man canoe during a lesson in early Hawaiian navigation. Then it's off to Florida to join members of the Seminole tribe who show us different uses of plants as tools and food in the everglades.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: This episode, we head to the bright sunshine of the Bahamas. Philippe will start off getting up close underwater with Great Hammerhead sharks. Then we join a professional freediver to get a look at the world's deepest saltwater blue hole.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet
programme.desc: This episode, we look to debunk a few predatory myths from our oceans to deserts. We join the shark research team at the University of Miami for two days of shark studies - first right by the city skyline and then further out to sea.

programme.title: Access All Areas
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando is on a quest to discover the truth behind the city of Naples, is it a kingdom of violence and a culture obsessed with death?

programme.title: K2: The Impossible Descent
programme.desc: On July 22, 2018, a Polish ski mountaineer clicked into his bindings at an altitude of 8,611m to make history. Follow Andrzej Bargiel’s expedition from Poland to Pakistan, as he descends K2 on skis.

programme.title: King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga
programme.desc: It's all or nothing as underdog Tom Liu drives himself to the brink in a heart-stopping Ultra 4 race.

programme.title: Car Crews with Supercar Blondie
programme.desc: Given special access to a 2 million dollar exclusive McClaren Senna, Supercar Blondie digs under the surface to uncover gang feuds in the SLAB (Slow, Low and Bangin’) community and meets up with legendary hip hop artists Slim Thug and Paul Wall.

programme.title: MTB Heroes: Trailblazers
programme.desc: A Canadian MTB adventurer explores Madagascar and shows the behind the scenes processes of making a film.

programme.title: MTB Heroes: Trailblazers
programme.desc: An Irish MTB pro rider discovers and rides the most amazing trails that Norway has to offer from the mountains to the ocean.

programme.title: Insight TV DNA
programme.desc: INSIGHT TV DNA dives deeper into the stories and influencers in the worlds of Action Sports, Lifestyle and Entertainment, presented in vivid short-form videos.

programme.title: Losing Traction
programme.desc: With the Formula Drift season is over, Matt Field takes a trip to Japan, the birthplace of drifting, to its origins.

programme.title: Losing Traction
programme.desc: After a few days in drift driving’s birthplace, Japan, Matt looks forward to learning and seeing more of the drift culture heading back to the states.

programme.title: Roads End
programme.desc: Two adrenaline junkies that love nothing more than off road adventure motor biking. And they’re off on their most epic journey ever, to Argentina.

programme.title: Roads End
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are pushed to their limits. Fighting through the rough ride across the scorching sand dunes littered with shrubbery Rob is unable to continue.

programme.title: F2: Tackling Europe
programme.desc: The Freestyler's head to the Netherlands meeting up with football legends Edgar Davids and Ronald de Boer.

programme.title: Car Crews with Supercar Blondie
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 1
programme.desc: Sharp shooting Conor Mcgregor, the judo french force, Teddy Riner and the WWE duo, the Bella Twins

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 2
programme.desc: Combat sport stars living it up outside of their sport, Anthony Joshua, Ronda Rousey & Paige VanZant

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 3
programme.desc: Manny Pacquiao, We also look at the greatest, Muhammad Ali and the wrestler Helen Maroulis.

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 4
programme.desc: We Speak to "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey, Mexico's finest, Canelo Alvarez and Nikki Bella and John Cena.

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 5
programme.desc: Learn about colour commentator Joe Rogan, Zou Shiming and Kosovo's first Olympic gold medallist.

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 6
programme.desc: Learn About British Boxing Star Nicola Adams And More In Fightstars

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 7
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone learns how to box, Demi Lovato's love life, plus Angela Lee and Paige VanZant

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 8
programme.desc: Wladimir Klitschko, idris Elba, Tito Ortiz, Katie Taylor and one of Hollywood's stars, Jackie Chan

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 9
programme.desc: Tyson Fury, Nicola Adams, Conor McGregor, Nate Diaz. Heavyweight hero turned salesman George Foreman

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 10
programme.desc: Floyd Mayweather Jr and his post boxing career and some anti trash talkers in the sport.

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 11
programme.desc: UFC vet Anderson Silva, 50 Cent tries to make it in the ring and Anthony Joshua has a small surprise

programme.title: Fight Stars Episode 12
programme.desc: Jon Jones, Jay Z & Oscar De La Hoya hedge their bets. American boxer turned MMA fighter, Holly Holm

programme.title: A Champion's Journey
programme.desc: 5 fights, 2 fights in one night, the winner gets a million dollars. This is a champions journey to $1 Million Dollars and a look at the toughest tournament in modern day sports.

programme.title: The Real Ayrton Senna
programme.desc: A unique look at the private life of a sporting superstar, the film moves from a series of small revealing cameos in the F1 racing world, to an in-depth portrait of Senna’s life at his homes in Brazil.

programme.title: The Bugatti Chronicles
programme.desc: A documentary about the life of Ettore Bugatti, the automobile manufacturer. Bugatti means luxury, speed, elegance. Despites its Italian patronym it’s also a French brand implanted in the heart of Alsace, in Molsheim.

programme.title: Inside Chinese Football
programme.desc: Chinese football is in dire straits to the great despair of the country fans but not for lack of money since local clubs lavish outrageous amounts of money to attract foreign players and coaches. So why can’t China enjoy the same success in football as in other sports? To solve this enigma you need a total immersion into the strange and somewhat surrealist world of Chinese football. This provocative film goes beyond the strict sports analysis. It is an illustration of the shortcomings of a system not used to give such an image of failure to the rest of the world.

programme.title: On The Bank 2018 - Ep 5
programme.desc: It's an underwater special in this edition of the show - with Rob discussing some extraordinary, unseen footage of fish behavior. There's the first edition of Andy's River Keeper's Diary, and Mark Bartlett takes Hughesey hunting for carp on a commercial match fishery.

programme.title: On the Bank 2018 - Ep 7
programme.desc: In this episode of 'On The Bank'....Hughesey finally gets his way and takes Fordy carp fishing! Andy also takes on Europe's most successful match angler Jon Whincup - whose competition winnings in the past 12 months totalled over £100,000 - in a match for a quid! Rob swaps his carp rods for pike tactics in an unforgettable session at Chew Valley with Ben Humber.

programme.title: Pele - The Last Show
programme.desc: On August 28, 1977, the "King of Soccer" left his throne vacant. This is a journey through his last match, a long farewell reported by those who were there and left a mark not only on Pelé but also on an era. Pelé is almost 37 and wears N.Y. Cosmos jersey: his body is worn out, 20 glorious seasons on his shoulders and the golden years of retirement ahead.

programme.title: Head On
programme.desc: Head On is a rugby documentary highlighting the issue surrounding head concussion in the sport at all levels of the game. Current and former players describe their own experience’s and thoughts on the challenge to keep the game as safe as possible

programme.title: Patagonia Triple Crown
programme.desc: A group of kayakers find themselves in the difficult mission of running the three less explored and most dangerous rivers of the south of the world. The Pascua River, Bravo and Baker. They will overcome the difficult tests that the patagonia will put on them, in addition they will learn about of the complicated environmental situation that Chile is suffering in its fight for fresh water. Best Action - Waterwalker Film Festival 2020. Best Documentary - Great Lakes International Film Festival 2020. Outstanding Achievement Award - DIFF 2020. Finalist - VIMFF 2020. Winner - World Film Carnival 2020. Winner - CICFF 2020. 3 Awards - Canadian Cinematography Awards 2020. Winner - VS Cinefest 2020. Winner - TIFF 2019. Official Selections 2020: Independent Shorts Awards, IndieX Film Fest, Lookout Wild Film Festival. Official Selections 2019: BANFF, TRAVEL FILM International Film Festival.

programme.title: Gone Fishin'
programme.desc: Diversity Charters from a base in North Harbour, forty minutes from Auckland City. Damo the skipper, ably assisted by Chris, who was responsible for driving on this day, is one of those captains who knows his trade inside out. We were heading out into the Hauraki Gulf to take advantage of some excellent snapper fishing and to inspect a range of weapons and tactics.

programme.title: Fishing Expedition Amazonia
programme.desc: Close encounters with caiman alligators, piranha, vampire bats, tapir and a ton of biting insects - all this and more, as extreme adventure angler Steve Townson takes on some of the Amazon's most ferocious predatory freshwater fish.

programme.title: Saving Warru
programme.desc: Warru, or black-footed rock-wallaby, is one of South Australia's most endangered mammals. In 2007, when numbers dropped below 200 in the remote north-west of the State, the Warru Recovery Team was formed to help save the precious species from extinction. Bringing together contemporary science, practical on-ground threat management and traditional Anangu ecological knowledge, this unique decade-long program has recently celebrated the release of dozens of warru to the wild for the first time.

programme.title: Shifting Ice + Changing Tides
programme.desc: ‘Shifting Ice and Changing Tides’ is a human and wind powered, female led, ski and sail expedition to the west coast of Greenland. In this remote, fascinating and beautiful region, six women will explore and ski first descents while limiting their environmental footprint by sailing and climbing.

programme.title: Wonder Women S1E1 India
programme.desc: In India, the Dalit are the lowest caste in the social order, and girls are especially vulnerable to mistreatment, but a group of young women from the city of Dindigul are breaking tradition by becoming the first female performers in a drumming competition.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Amaranth
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Quinoa
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: The Plastic Whales of Amsterdam
programme.desc: We're all aware that we need to reuse our plastic, but one entrepreneur took it to the extreme. When the Amsterdam canals were becoming too clogged with plastic, Marius Smit founded the Plastic Whale, a boat made out of plastic with the sole purpose of fishing for more.

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Wadjemup : Black Prison White Playground
programme.desc: Black Prison White Playground. Wadjemup/Rottnest Island. A beautiful place that is culturally and spiritually significant to Aboriginal people. And also a site where gross harm took place and hundreds of Aboriginal men are buried in unmarked graves.

programme.title: Letters to our Children: Stories of Refuge
programme.desc: A group of immigrant and refugee mothers from 10 different countries and speaking different languages create a book of illustrations showcasing heartfelt letters to their children as a way to explain what brought them to Winnipeg, Canada and what they hope their lives will be like. This film follows the women’s incredible journey as they find a way to pass their stories to their children.

programme.title: Only Me Generation
programme.desc: Has China’s ‘one child policy’ really created a generation of spoilt, privileged, selfish young adults? This documentary is a brave expose of what everyday life is like for the ‘Only Me’ generation in China. For the first time on camera, these young Chinese will speak candidly of the huge pressure and high expectations from their parents and reveal the dreams, worries, hopes and fears of a generation.

programme.title: Traceable
programme.desc: In a world filled with throw-away fashion, emerging designer Laura Siegel’s dream is to shift the perspectives of consumers and connect them to the hands that craft her garments. Follow this idealistic designer as she travels across India to produce her collection. But will positioning her collection in the sustainable domain enable her to survive in the highly competitive fashion industry?

programme.title: Nuremberg - The Nazis Facing Their Crimes
programme.desc: It was one of the biggest trials of the 20th century. The one that opened the way for the creation of an international justice system. It was the first trial to be filmed, and yet very few people have ever seen the nearly 25 hours of original footage. For the very 1st time, a film takes viewers inside the courtroom, via the original trial footage filmed by John Ford's crew.

programme.desc: Laurel and Hardy were a comedy double act during the early Classical Hollywood era of American cinema.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Led by Rafa Nadal, the Spanish team were this year’s favourite until they suffered a serious setback. The team’s number two player, Roberto Bautista, had to leave the competition for his hometown to be at his father´s side during the last hours of his life. Without Bautista, Nadal and Feliciano López heroically managed to lead the team into the final. But then came the news that thrilled tennis fans worldwide: Bautista is coming back to the competition after his father´s funeral, and he´s ready to play. United again, the members of the Spanish team fight for victory in the grand final, where something far beyond tennis is at stake.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Isabela
programme.desc: A darker look at paradise in the Galapagos archipelago. Environmental artist and world traveller Billy Strong and Filmmaker / Photographer Dell Cullum, both from East Hampton, New York take an unauthorized journey and expedition onto never before landed locations of the Galapagos, to show the devastating effects of ocean-borne trash and debris on it’s shorelines.

programme.title: Living The Change
programme.desc: Living the Change explores solutions to the global crises we face today through the inspiring stories of people pioneering change in their own lives and in their communities in order to live in a sustainable and regenerative way.

programme.title: Australia's Camel Man
programme.desc: Afghan Willie explores the outback on his camel train, the limestone formations, the Pinnacles, of Western Australia, The Spirit of Aviation in Bundaberg, with a memorial to aviator Bert Hinkler.

programme.title: Wildlife Warriors, Classic Cars
programme.desc: From the wildlife conservation projects at Dreamworld to the rejuvenated Star on the Gold Coast. Also the superb motor vehicles of the Gosford Classic Car Museum.

programme.title: Goshen
programme.desc: ‘Goshen – Places of Refuge for the Running People’ is a powerful documentary depicting the diet and active lifestyle of the indigenous Tarahumara, a light-footed running tribe, who are striving to maintain their ancient culture against all odds.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China | Season 1 | Episode 1
programme.desc: SerpentZA and Laowhy86 begin their epic adventure in Shandong Province, starting in former German concession, Qingdao. They taste a bizarre, wriggly local speciality explore hidden war tunnels and head to a sleepy seaside village, famous for its seaweed-roofed cottages.

programme.title: Animal Society
programme.desc: We explore the Animal Kingdom and look closely at how animal tribes/families live together. The family dynamic – the role of mum and dad, the competition and bonding between the offspring, when do they leave their patch/home to start their own ? We see common themes in how animal families work and live together, protect each other and then go off to fend for themselves across a range of species.

programme.title: A Simpler Way : Crisis As Opportunity
programme.desc: A feature-length documentary that follows a community in Australia who came together to explore and demonstrate a simpler way to live in response to global crises.

programme.title: Flirting With Flamenco
programme.desc: When Sylvia's well-meaning dad (Watt) surprises her with a devastating revelation, Sylvia's world is turned upside down. But will she crumble or prove herself at the local flamenco contest? An uplifting feel-good Brit comedy drama, Flirting with Flamenco will have you laughing, crying and feeling empowered to turn your life around.

programme.title: Lost and Found Cowboy:Lost and Found Cowboy Season 1
programme.desc: Yukata Cowboy, a Japanese-American street performer, helps foreigners in Tokyo. He guides Cindy, an American dancer, through Japans cultural maze she inspires him to learn to dance. They begin to perform together and become romantically involved, but one day, Cindy suddenly, disappears. Yukata Cowboy now has to travel around the world to find his soul-mate...

programme.title: Lost and Found Cowboy Season 2:Lost and Found Cowboy Season 2
programme.desc: Spring 2020, as Covid 19 spreads across the globe, the whole world is under lockdown. Alone in his house in Tokyo, Yukata Cowboy sinks into depression over his girlfriend Cindys sudden departure from their life together. Isolated by Covid and Cindys disappearance, he becomes despondent. One day, his friends Lotte, a budding comedian in London, and Maribel, a flamenco dancer in Madrid, reach out to him over the internet. Realizing the state he is in, they team up together to encourage him to perform comedy and to learn flamenco - online. Though initially resistant, Yukata Cowboy eventually performs comedy successfully with Lotte for a Zoom audience and dances flamenco with Maribel and Lotte. From across the globe, they celebrate their strong ties of friendship, and conquer the loneliness of quarantine.

programme.title: Guardian of the Highlands
programme.desc: Sean Connery brings to life Sir Billi, a skateboarding veterinarian and number one grandpa. He channels the spirit of 007 James Bond to go above and beyond the call of duty and rescue a goat who thinks he's a dog, an admiral who's afraid of the water, and a beaver who was raised by rabbits. This heart-warming story is packed with enough stunts, skydiving, and car chases to keep the whole family on the edge of their seats.

programme.title: Perfect Girl
programme.desc: A coming of age romance for anyone who's ever had a crush. Since high school, Stan and Jenny have had crushes on each other. They wrote letters to one another over school holidays but in person they barely spoke sharing only the occasional lingering glance and smile. Over the years they fantasized about how perfect they would be as lovers. Ten years later they bump into each other and have the chance to make it a reality, but it's not that simple self doubt, fear of rejection, of losing their fantasies will hold them back from what could be the perfect union.

programme.title: Sherlock Jr
programme.desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

programme.title: Three Ages
programme.desc: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

programme.title: The Saphead
programme.desc: The simple-minded son of a rich financier must find his own way in the world.

Though initially resistant, Yukata Cowboy eventually performs comedy successfully with Lotte for a Zoom audience and dances flamenco with Maribel and Lotte. From across the globe, they celebrate their strong ties of friendship, and conquer the loneliness of quarantine.

programme.title: Guardian of the Highlands
programme.desc: Sean Connery brings to life Sir Billi, a skateboarding veterinarian and number one grandpa. He channels the spirit of 007 James Bond to go above and beyond the call of duty and rescue a goat who thinks he's a dog, an admiral who's afraid of the water, and a beaver who was raised by rabbits. This heart-warming story is packed with enough stunts, skydiving, and car chases to keep the whole family on the edge of their seats.

programme.title: Perfect Girl
programme.desc: A coming of age romance for anyone who's ever had a crush. Since high school, Stan and Jenny have had crushes on each other. They wrote letters to one another over school holidays but in person they barely spoke sharing only the occasional lingering glance and smile. Over the years they fantasized about how perfect they would be as lovers. Ten years later they bump into each other and have the chance to make it a reality, but it's not that simple self doubt, fear of rejection, of losing their fantasies will hold them back from what could be the perfect union.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Malta- Laura visits a re-enactment of La Guardia, which represents a military performance that used to take place in the time of the Knights of St. John. Plus, the walled city of Mdina then Valletta Gozo, The Blue Grotto, St. Paul's Catacombs, and the Temple of Hagar Qim. Finally, Laura rounds out her trip with an excursion to Ggantia, the oldest free-standing structure in the world.

programme.title: Kumu Hina

programme.title: Putting On
programme.desc: S1 | A Revry Original Reality Series, ‘Putting On’ follows a young entrepreneur, On Mekahel, as he struggles to launch his underwear line with his ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Red Sea Jaws
programme.desc: This chilling documentary investigates the December 2010 shark attacks in the resort of Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt, which left one tourist dead and four others seriously injured.

programme.title: The Tomb of the USSR
programme.desc: The Soviet invasion of Afghanistan triggered 10 years of a dirty conflict that changed the face of the world. Through exclusive archives of the Afghan guerilla and the testimony of the local Soviet former commander in chief, this film unveils the full story of a war which marked the beginning of the fall of the USSR.

programme.title: Yugen
programme.desc: Yūgen is a 3-year borderless mountain-based documentary film that explores the connection we as mountaineers and environmentalists share with the natural world. Following the journey of snowboard mountaineer Rafael Pease and crew as they travel throughout the corners of the world, trudging gear into unseen locations the crew works tirelessly to capture the true essence of being one with the mountain. Experiencing the most unique untold stories of the ecological conscious that resides deep in the soul of the mountains, told through the perspective of legendary humans who coincide in these very places. Finalist - Festival Internacional De Cine Con Medios 2018. Official Selections 2018: Freeride Film Festival, Winter Is My Love, Winter Film Festival, Splitboard Film Festival, Festival Cinema Muntanya, EHO Mountain Film Festival, Arctic Open Film Festival, Pakistan International Film Fesitval, Rome Independent Prisma Awards.

programme.title: Henry and Anne: The Lovers who Changed History
programme.desc: Historian Dr Suzannah Lipscomb unfolds the extraordinary story of the tumultuous love affair between Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn, and asks: Was it really love that brought them together? And was it love that tore them apart?

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Beginning in 1978, a string of university, airline and mail bombings terrorized the country, injured 23 people, and claimed three lives. Investigators chased down hundreds of leads, but for years, the bomber’s identity remained a mystery. He was known to the public only as “the Unabomber” until a particular turn of phrase led authorities and introduced the world to Ted Kaczynski.

programme.title: Satori
programme.desc: The feeling of opening yourself up to the ocean is one of both beauty and fear. In that moment 'satori' is reached, a feeling of instant awakening. Satori is 'a glimpse of truth' or a sudden moment of awakening. To have the confidence to overcome your fears and unlock your passions you need to be completely present. This cinematic film, documenting a group of close-knit big wave surfers who have dedicated their lives to the ocean and riding the huge waves on the shores of picturesque Cape Town, South Africa. Their passion is riding huge waves at two surf breaks situated in South peninsula, the infamous Dungeons below the sentinel mountain in Hout Bay and Sunset Reef 1km out to sea off the small seaside village of Kommetjie. While each surfer is surfing these waves for different reasons, the film discovers that there is a connection that they all feel and believe in. This connection is the raw beauty of the ocean beneath them. Best Film "Ocean Experience" - Waimea Ocean Film Festival 2019. Official Selections 2019: Honolulu Surf Film Festival, Cine Mar Surf Movie Night, Newport Beach Film Festival, San Luis Obispo International Film Festival. Official Selection 2018: Wavescape Film Festival.

programme.title: Switzerland: Hitler's Bankers
programme.desc: A series of unprecedented revelations explains how Germany was able to finance its huge war expenses. The war might have ended in 1943 had Switzerland not recycled the gold looted by the Nazis throughout Europe and France.

programme.title: Stolen Beauty: The Nazi Obsession For Art
programme.desc: From the plundering and confiscation of art from museums and collectors’ houses, to the 4 great exhibitions which take stock of the situation 80 years later, this investigative series examines what happened to Nazi-looted art treasures. Revealing how Hitler and Goering were both compulsive collectors, the 3-episode series retraces the dramatic stories of families involved at the time and the difficult recovery of artworks carried out over the last few decades.

programme.title: Eastwood
programme.desc: On May 31st, legendary actor, director, and producer Clint Eastwood turns 91 years old. Eastwood is Hollywood royalty with a career spaning more than 70 years. From Rawhide to Dirty Harry to Gran Torino Clint participated in productions on 4 continents, in 3 languages, of 5 different genres and eventually garnering 4 Academy Awards. Sabbatical Entertainment proudly presents our newest documentary reliving and recounting the life of one of the greatest artist in the history of entertainment.

programme.title: Savage Wild
programme.desc: Manny returns to Florida's Dead River in search of a massive 14 foot alligator.

programme.title: Savage Wild
programme.desc: Manny swims with giant gulf sturgeon on the Suwanee River.

programme.title: Savage Wild
programme.desc: Manny explores the Santa Fe River in search of alligators, snapping turtles and other wildlife.

programme.title: Savage Wild
programme.desc: Exploring a flooded abandoned mine at night, Manny Puig searches for predators.

programme.title: On the Brink
programme.desc: Malaika Vaz spends a few days with snake rescuer Ajay Giri in Agumbe to better understand the king cobra and its secret world.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: Austin is back in his element when he goes out to find the largest snake in Africa. To say this creature is dangerous is an understatement, as it has been known to prey on crocodiles.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: Austin Stevens travels to Swaziland in search of the rare black rhino. After a number of close and dangerous encounters, Austin finally finds what he is looking for.

programme.title: Austin Stevens
programme.desc: Austin travels to Mexico to catch a glimpse of the Tzabcan rattlesnake, which was once hailed as a god by the ancient Mayans. With the help of local guides and a shaman, he braves underground rivers and dense rainforest in search of the snake.

programme.title: Austin Stevens

programme.title: Human Prey

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

programme.title: One Wonderful Sunday
programme.desc: Yuzo and his fiancée Masako spend their Sunday afternoon together, trying to have a good time on just thirty-five yen. They manage to have many small adventures, especially because Masako's optimism and belief in dreams is able to lift Yuzo from his realistic despair.

programme.title: Closer to God
programme.desc: A genetic scientist successfully clones the first human being, a baby girl named Elizabeth, but his work is soon threatened by a dark secret, a secret that threatens to destroy everything and everyone precious to him.

programme.title: Angelina Jolie
programme.desc: Skin Deep' is a touching story of a woman with conviction, who is making a meaningful mark on the world for the better of all. World renowned for her exotic looks and Oscar award winning movies, there is so much more to this A-list celebrity than meets the eye. ‘Skin Deep’ is a fascinating documentary which goes beyond the Hollywood hype and explores the incredible life of Angelina Jolie.

programme.title: For All Eternity
programme.desc: Fanny is training in Vienna when she meets Yunlong a Chines policeman. The two form an instant connection and against the wishes of everyone else in her life, Fanny moves to China to be with him. Soon afterward, however, the cultural revolution in China forces the two into hiding to escape persecution by the communists. Yunlong is eventually caught and imprisoned, leaving Fanny alone in a foreign land with no idea what it will take for her to survive.

programme.title: Angelina Jolie
programme.desc: Skin Deep' is a touching story of a woman with conviction, who is making a meaningful mark on the world for the better of all. World renowned for her exotic looks and Oscar award winning movies, there is so much more to this A-list celebrity than meets the eye. ‘Skin Deep’ is a fascinating documentary which goes beyond the Hollywood hype and explores the incredible life of Angelina Jolie.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman
programme.desc: Since her first major role in BMX Bandits, Nicole Kidman has come a long way. Capturing the hearts of audiences and major Hollywood stars alike, this beautiful, talented redhead has emerged from personal turmoil as an enduring, graceful icon of the silver screen and beyond.

programme.title: Inside Fighter
programme.desc: Pro boxer Frank Lo Porto dreams of becoming the first Italian/Australian world champion in fifty years, and when current undefeated champion Austin Trout offers him a chance to fight for the title at short notice, Frank jumps at the chance. Facing an uphill battle to be ready in time, Frank undertakes a gruelling training regime that tests his mental, physical and emotional boundaries. But Frank is destroyed in the fight and returns home a broken, shattered man.

programme.title: Girl Wired
programme.desc: A Preteen computer prodigy, Glory Vinci has invented an advance medical Ray Gun that can read peoples moods. She has been offered a scholarship to a prestigious Graduate Research Program but her guardian Grandfather is in gambling trouble with the mob, and when the nefarious gangsters discover that Gloria's device can read and steal anybody's credit card number they want to get their hands on it.

programme.title: Jane Fonda
programme.desc: Watch the story of Jane Fonda, the famous American actress.

programme.title: West of Eden
programme.desc: The affluent farmer's son is everything Billy desires. The farm is everything the head drover wants. A story of forbidden love, revenge and a family torn apart, inspired by true events.

programme.title: Best Friends Forever
programme.desc: The adventures of Mogu & Perol and Toki & Dewai and many others in this collection of animated short films.

programme.title: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: A mutant potato has a chip on his shoulder and decides to take revenge and an intrepid camerawoman heads to a dark lake, plus much more in these spooky animations.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Walter applies for work experience at Dennis' dad's work and Dennis might have to move out of Beanotown.

programme.title: Discover Real Lives
programme.desc: A filmmaker turns the camera on domestic workers in Hong Kong and a look at Chef Peng, who came to London in the 1970's and set about changing Chinatown are just two of the stories in this collection of short documentaries.

programme.title: Discover Real Lives
programme.desc: Real Lives now in these short documentaries, where we meet four seemingly unrelated people in Wellington, New Zealand and much more.

programme.title: Impact Spotlight
programme.desc: A collection of documentaries on the devastating impact caused by plastics in the ocean.

programme.title: Feet Up Drama
programme.desc: A hopeless romantic takes desperate steps to win back her ex and two 12 year olds venture out in the Australia bush to play The Boyfriend Game, in this collection of short dramas.

programme.title: Feet Up Romantic Drama
programme.desc: A fake marriage to get a green card and Ava tries speed dating. Put your feet up and enjoy these short romantic drama and comedy films.

programme.title: Woman Tales
programme.desc: Strong female protagonists and female-focused stories are showcased in this selection of powerful short films highlighting the struggles and successes of friends, mothers, sisters, wives, and daughters.

programme.title: Spanish Corner
programme.desc: Gripping stories from all over the Spanish-speaking world including social issue dramas, romance, and thrillers. Quietly powerful and full of subtext, each film has its own message and impact.

programme.title: Animation
programme.desc: High quality animated short films ranging from stop-motion clay, hand-drawn, traditional 2D, and motion graphics. Experience the world of animated characters and animals in a huge variety of funny, bittersweet, and sad tales for all ages.

programme.title: Best of Sofy
programme.desc: A selection of the most compelling, highest quality, emotionally impactful, and award-winning shorts on Sofy TV, includes a range of all genres from all over the world.

programme.title: Broad Comedy
programme.desc: Full of hilarious scenarios, characters, dialogue, and consequences, this selection of shorts has it all. A range of international films are included but the humor remains universal.

programme.title: Documentaries
programme.desc: A wide range of compelling and informative documentaries taking you to different parts of the world and exploring themes such as the environment, health, dance, art, and social issues.

programme.title: Broad Comedy
programme.desc: Full of hilarious scenarios, characters, dialogue, and consequences, this selection of shorts has it all. A range of international films are included but the humor remains universal.

programme.title: Rocks at Whiskey Trench
programme.desc: This feature documentary profiles a key element of the 1990 Oka crisis in which the Mohawk communities of Kahnawake and Kanehsatake stood against the Canadian military and Canadian citizens in a stand-off that turned violent. On August 28, 1990, a convoy of 75 cars left the Mohawk community of Kahnawake and crossed Montreal's Mercier Bridge-straight into an angry mob that pelted the vehicles with rocks. The targets of this violence were Mohawk women, children and elders leaving Kahnawake, in fear of a possible advance by the Canadian army. This film is the fourth in Alanis Obomsawin's landmark series on the Mohawk rebellions that shook Canada in 1990.

programme.title: Ava's Magical Adventure
programme.desc: Ava is a 10-year-old girl who runs away from home with her best friend, Nellie, a 2-ton circus elephant. They are pursued by everyone from the police to the circus' owner.

programme.title: Up the Yangtze
programme.desc: A luxury cruise boat motors up the Yangtze - navigating the mythic waterway known in China simply as "The River." The Yangtze is about to be transformed by the biggest hydroelectric dam in history. At the river's edge - a young woman says goodbye to her family as the floodwaters rise towards their small homestead. The Three Gorges Dam - contested symbol of the Chinese economic miracle - provides the epic backdrop for Up the Yangtze, a dramatic feature documentary on life inside modern China.

programme.title: Bride to Be
programme.desc: What if pain was merely a set up for the ultimate surprise party? Genie Burns, owner of Surprise Enterprise, masterminds off the wall surprise parties in nobody would-suspect-it locations. Here she takes crazy risks but in her love life, she plays it safe. Her partner Steven, who hilariously calls her out on every issue she owns, is gay which makes him safe. Danny, her friend from college would be perfect for her but she keeps him in the friend zone. Along comes Jeff, everything she avoids, but his charm and depth draw her in. Is he the right one because he challenges her fears, or the wrong one because he implodes them? And why, she asks, are cereal boxes summoning her in the night! Meanwhile, Surprise Enterprise is hired by an anonymous Hollywood producer to throw a surprise wedding for his intended bride. Genie must get the bride down the aisle without knowing she's the bride. Her plan is to have him pretend he's filming a movie with a wedding at the end, giving his girlfriend a role. But as Genie plans the wedding, everything seems to go wrong, and her own life begins to take turns. In the end, what's real in life screams.... Surprise!

programme.title: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Ancient mysteries. Powerful evil. And a fearless hero's quest through a fantastical realm of steam-powered wonders and sinister magic... In THE ADVENTURER: THE CURSE OF THE MIDAS BOX, seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundi's life is turned upside down when his parents vanish and his younger brother is kidnapped. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth - but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!

programme.title: Amityville II: The Possession
programme.desc: A dysfunctional family moves into a satanic house, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: After being hypnotized during a party, a man begins seeing visions involving the ghost of a young woman.

programme.title: Looking Glass
programme.desc: A couple buy a desert motel where they find out that strange, mysterious events occur.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: When his brother goes missing, Tommy, the family's black-sheep, cares for his sister-in-law and nieces.

programme.title: Rhapsody in August
programme.desc: Three generations' responses to the atomic bombing of Nagasaki.

programme.title: Another Man's Wife
programme.desc: After a tragic car accident, a family gets away to a remote mountain cabin to recover and rebuild their lives. During their vacation, a handsome man befriends them only to get revenge and destroy what is left of their fragile lives.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her. What she encounters is a wall of academia bureaucracy and coverups that point to an abuse of authority stemming all the way to the government.

programme.title: Fatal Memories
programme.desc: Psychological thriller. A woman tries to help her sister remember the events surrounding the fatal stabbing of their mother.

programme.title: Mount Pleasant
programme.desc: Three couples find their destinies irrevocably intertwined in a fusion of obsession and fragile love when a six-year-old girl finds a junkie's discarded needle while playing in her backyard.

programme.title: Same Time Next Week
programme.desc: After her husband passes away, widow Sarah meets widower Ryan who she enlists to help her complete her husband’s bucket list. Their shared loss and efforts to cope ultimately draw them together.

programme.title: Breakfast At Shorts
programme.desc: All happiness depend on a leisurely breakfast and watching great films, have a good breakfast and spend the rest of the day watching magnificent films at Shorts.

programme.title: Hit Pix
programme.desc: We know, there is too much choice these days. You can't just sit down and watch a film because there are too many to choose from. We'll do the heavy lifting for you, and here are the finest selections of films on Shorts that will make you never want to leave the house.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: It is often said a family that plays together stays together. All it really means is a family that spends time together will have a close bond and a lasting relationship. Thus we’ve selected remarkably Family films that tug at your heart as long as you watch them with your family.

programme.desc: If you go to a film festival and watch a bunch of shorts, you will always find shorts are where people are taking more risks and pushing more boundaries … simply because they have much to lose.

programme.title: Films By Her
programme.desc: Women’s films genre is one of the most visible genres in film criticism today and most dominant trend in cinemas lately.

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Time will fly by in this riveting, mind-bending, sci-fi thriller. FBI agent Sally Biggs has a unique gift - she can rewind time, allowing her to control almost everything in her life! But when her scientist husband mysteriously vanishes, she faces a terrifying truth – a truth out of her control. Now she must contend with a dark, post-apocalyptic future that should never have existed.

programme.title: The Captor
programme.desc: Starring Ethan Hawke and Noomi Rapace and from the executive producer of BlacKkKlansman, this thrilling crime caper is based on the absurd but true story of the 1973 Stockholm bank heist. Outlaw Lars takes two workers hostage and demands his friend is released from prison, $1 million and a getaway car. As negotiations reach deadlock, hostage Bianca becomes strangely attracted to her captor.

programme.title: Salt Beef & Rye
programme.desc: This vibrant documentary is inspired by the colourful characters who frequent the world famous Brick Lane. London's reputation as the cultural hub of the world can be attributed in part to its deep-rooted history and diverse communities. Salt Beef & Rye takes audiences on a tour through one of the city's most influential streets.

programme.title: Man Down
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf (Fury), Gary Oldman (The Dark Knight), Jai Courtney (Suicide Squad) and Kate Mara (House of Cards) headline this gripping, post-apocalyptic thriller. Home bound from Afghanistan, Gabriel, a hard-nosed US marine whose instinct is to shoot first and ask questions later, desperately searches for his estranged family. This pulse-pounding story delivers a hard-hitting message.

programme.title: Once More
programme.desc: From acclaimed director Rob Reiner (When Harry Met Sally) comes a heart-warming, inspirational film about finding yourself again and learning to let others in. Frustrated writer, Monte Wildhorn, takes a lakeside cabin for the summer to rekindle his passion for writing. While there he befriends the family next door who help him to find inspiration again. Starring Academy Award Winner Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: The Sea Wolf Eps 1 of 2
programme.desc: The Sea Wolf is an engrossing psychological thriller based on the best-selling novel by Jack London. Tyrannical, brutal and notorious, Captain Wolf Larsen, AKA the infamous Sea Wolf (Sebastian Koch: Bridge of Spies) rules the crew of his seal-hunting schooner with an iron fist. A unique high-seas adventure that will stir, inspire, and excite like never before.

programme.title: Raindrop - Season 1 - Home sweet home
programme.desc: Raindrop is a drop of water. You can find it in the forest, in the river, in the sea and even in your house. Surrounded by her friends Vaporón (a cloud) and Frigote (a cube of ice), she will live many adventures and defeat a germ, the evil bacteria, in her attempt to destroy the environment.

Throughout the four seasons of the series he will discover where fruits and vegetables come from, what animals are in the sea and in the jungle and the sound of musical instruments.

The series explores Molang and Piu Piu’s everyday life with warmth and humor.

programme.title: Munki and Trunk - Season 1 - Episodes 13-15
programme.desc: Hot Stuff | Bubble Trouble | A Sneeze On The Breeze Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Black or White is the story of a grandfather who is suddenly left to care for his beloved granddaughter. When her paternal grandmother seeks custody with the help of her brother, the little girl is torn between two families who love her deeply. With the best intentions at heart, both families fight for what they feel is right and are soon forced to confront their true feelings about race, forgiveness and understanding. Anchored by an all-star cast and inspired by true events, Black or White is a look at two seemingly different worlds, in which nothing is as simple as black or white.

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: 1879, nine-year-old Maria Sautuola and her father, Marcelino, discover the first cave art and accomplished paintings of galloping bison. But Maria's mother, devout Conchita, is disturbed at the idea that prehistoric savages could have created such magnificent art. The Catholic Church sees this as an attack on Biblical truth. And Carthailac, the leading prehistorian, condemns Marcelino and his discovery as fakes. The family is thrown into crisis and the cave locked up. It takes all their love for each other to find a way through to redemption and recognition.

programme.title: Mail Order Monster
programme.desc: After witnessing her mother's death 3 years ago, 12-year-old Sam Pepper has never been able to move on. With her reclusive nature and place at the 'nerd table', Sam is an easy target for bullying, even from her former friend PJ. One day, when PJ humiliates her in front of all their classmates, Sam decides she's finally had enough. Her imagination is sparked by an ad in a comic book, offering to deliver all the parts you need to build your own 'Monster'. Finally, Sam is able to give PJ a taste of her own medicine. But just as her life takes a turn for the better, Sam's father reveals he's proposed to his girlfriend.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: Oscar nominated drama starring Johnny Depp and Leonardo DiCaprio. Gilbert feels trapped - with no father present and an eccentric family to care for, he is struggling to cope. His extremely overweight mother cannot leave the house and his younger brother with learning difficulties has a knack for finding trouble. Despite the hardships Gilbert perseveres, but will he be able to live his own life?

programme.title: Once More
programme.desc: From acclaimed director Rob Reiner (The Bucket List and When Harry Met Sally...). Monte Wildhorn (Morgan Freeman), a once legendary novelist whose struggle with alcoholism has sapped his passion for writing, takes a lakeside cabin for the summer in picturesque Belle Isle, and befriends the family next door, an attractive single mum (Virginia Madsen) and her young daughters, who help him find inspiration again.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: RED DOG: THE EARLY YEARS is a glorious tale of youthful adventure set in the Australian outback as a young boy and an Australian Kelpie sheep dog become the best of friends. Set in the late 1980s, 11-year-old Mick is sent to live with his stern farmer grandfather on a vast cattle station. There, he forms an unbreakable bond with a cute puppy he finds covered in blue mud after a storm. Together the pair embark on a series of great adventures amidst the stunning Aussie landscape.

programme.title: Battle for Skyark
programme.desc: In the near future the earth has become desolate and dangerous. Now inhabited by by a mysterious race of creatures, humanity has been forced to find refuge in the Skyark, a man-made city in the sky. As the population grows, space becomes scarce and only the rich and powerful can stay, dumping the poor and orphaned of Skyark to the abandoned earth. Among them is one boy, Rags, the son of a fallen commander who is determined to save his fellow orphans and exiles. Together with his friends, he must battle through the ruins of old earth, fighting off the horde of alien monsters to return to Skyark and bring peace back to the people.

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: It was a stroke of genius, but now the perfect crime is turning into a perfect disaster. Charles (Freeman), Roger (Walken) and George (H.Macey) are the very picture of honest security guards. But when they learn their favorite artworks are being sent to another museum, they concoct a plan to switch the real masterpieces with fakes. All goes well until a mistake forces these first-time thieves into a last-minute escapade.

programme.title: Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundi’s life is turned upside down when his younger brother is kidnapped from the streets of Victorian London. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, sinister strangers, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth – but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!

programme.title: After the Fall (2014)
programme.desc: When Bill, a family man and hardworking insurance adjuster, is fired from his job, he falls into quiet despair. He still leaves the house every morning pretending to go to work while secretly on a frantic hunt for a new job. Almost by accident, Bill begins a life of crime. Frightened and unsure of himself to begin with, he soon becomes more skilled in his new line of work, targeting those he believes deserve it most. However a close friend, who is a cop, begins to suspect that there may be more to Bill than first appears.

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...
